en.hero_tagline: I am not a resource. I am a creator.
en.f1_desc: Reclaiming status as a Living Man under Natural Law. Rejection of the 'Person' fiction.
en.f2_desc: Creator of UCTS, Solar-H2, and Moss Tile. Building the future of energy.
en.f3_desc: Survived genocide, war, and systemic oppression. From Donbass to German bureaucracy.
en.manifesto: We must save ourselves as humans to save humanity. I am the seed.
en.port_hero: Building infrastructure for a sovereign future.
en.ucts_desc: Turning toxic red mud into energy storage.
en.letter_mfa_title: DECLARATION OF PRESENCE OF A LIVING MAN
en.letter_mfa_intro: To the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Iceland and international human rights organizations.
en.letter_mfa_body:
I, Aleksandr Snigirev, declare the presence of a Living Man, endowed with inalienable rights by birth.

This declaration is based on the **UN Universal Declaration of Human Rights** and Natural Law.

### 1. Legal Status
I am not an economic resource or a legal fiction. I act as a free man. My presence on this Earth is self-sufficient.

### 2. Essence of Claim
For the past year, I have been under unprecedented bureaucratic pressure in the Federal Republic of Germany. This is manifested in deprivation of the right to movement and restriction of medical assistance.

### 3. Request for Protection
I appeal to the Republic of Iceland to grant me political asylum and international protection.

[View Portfolio of Engineering Solutions](./portfolio)
[Read detailed history of persecution](./history)

*Date: February 5, 2024*
*Signature: Aleksandr Snigirev*
